short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: QOL mod: Instantly download files without opening the next page in Canvas modules.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Instantly download files without opening new page in Canvas modules.

Toggle extension on/off easily!
Instant download on click or open options menu to go to file or download!
To open link normally while extension enabled, use CTRL + Left Click on link.

Supported languages: English, (new) Dutch
